title: How to use Search APIs in Azure Maps | Azure Friday
excerpt: In this episode, you'll learn how to do geocoding, reverse geocoding, search for Points of Interest and see an example using the JavaScript map control. Julie Kohler joins Scott Hanselman to discuss the core set of search APIs available in Azure Maps.  For more information:  â€¢ Azure Maps product page
